question: As per the recent monetary policy committee statement of the RBI, what is the expected GDP growth rate in FY22?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India announced its Monetary Policy committee decisions. As per the RBI, the GDP growth rate was projected at 10.5 per cent for the financial year 2021-22.
The RBI Governor said that the growth outlook has significantly improved and the vaccination drive will help the economic recover. The RBI retained the repo rate unchanged at four per cent.
